name: Krishna Choudhary
warning_signs: Severe swelling in legs, ankles, or face
Decreased urine output or dark-colored urine
follow_up_instructions: Monitor blood pressure daily and log readings
Attend dialysis sessions as scheduled (3 times per week)
Report any signs of infection immediately
discharge_summary:
Patient Krishna Choudhary was admitted on 2025-10-24 with Diabetic Nephropathy. 
During hospitalization, patient was managed with Aspirin 81mg daily, Insulin glargine 20 units at bedtime, Atorvastatin 20mg at bedtime. 
Procedures performed included Arteriovenous fistula creation, Peritoneal dialysis catheter insertion.
Patient's condition improved and was stable at discharge. 
Discharged home with instructions to follow up with nephrologist and continue medications as prescribed. 
Patient educated on warning signs and dietary restrictions.
